homeText: Crafting digital experiences with modern technologies. Specialized in full-stack development with a passion for creating innovative solutions that make a difference.
aboutBioP: Hi, I'm Soham Koli—a dedicated web developer who loves turning ideas into sleek, user-friendly digital experiences. I thrive on building responsive websites and web applications, blending creativity with modern frontend and backend tech to deliver solutions that are both functional and engaging.
achievementsSub: My learning journey and participation in various events and projects

achievements.title: Web Development Certificate
achievements.description: I successfully completed an 8-week online training on Web Development, covering HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, DBMS, PHP, JavaScript, React, and a Final Project module.

achievements.title: Hackathon Participation Certificate
achievements.description: I participated in NIRMAN ‘25, a 48-hour hackathon held at Amity School of Engineering and Technology, Amity University Mumbai, from 28th to 30th January 2025.

achievements.title: Hackathon Participation Certificate
achievements.description: I participated in the Mappls Appathon organized by MapmyIndia at IIT Delhi during Tryst'25: An Ingenious Stewardship, held from 10th to 12th March 2025.

achievements.title: Hackathon Participation Certificate
achievements.description: I actively participated in 'Hack for Impact' at E-Summit 2025 organized by the Entrepreneurship Cell, IIIT Delhi, held on 21st–22nd March 2025.

achievements.title: Generative AI Mastery Workshop
achievements.description: Attended and successfully completed a 6-hour intensive Generative AI Mastery Workshop, gaining practical insights into GenAI tools and applications, organized by NxtWave in collaboration with OpenAI Academy.

achievements.title: GenAI Buildathon Participation
achievements.description: Participated in India's Biggest GenAI Buildathon, hosted by NxtWave and OpenAI Academy, contributing to the Generative AI learning community and exploring real-world AI problem-solving.

certificatesSub: Professional certifications and achievements that validate my expertise

certificates.title: Getting Started with Linux Fundamentals 9.1
certificates.description: Completed RH104 course covering Linux basics: system access, file management, file systems, permissions, software installation, networking, and system resources. Achieved 100% completion.

certificates.title: Full-stack Development with Django: Managing Migrations
certificates.issuer: Coursera Project Network (via Pimpri Chinchwad University)
certificates.description: Completed a 2-hour guided project focused on Django migrations and database management. Learned to create Django apps with admin UI, build and roll back migrations, manage models, and display portfolio status in a dashboard.

certificates.title: React with AI
certificates.description: Completed a 6-week online training covering React fundamentals, states & useState, components & props, styling, events & useRef, functional programming with hooks, React Router, and AI integration. Recognized as a top performer.

certificates.title: Red Hat Application Development I: Programming in Java EE 7.0
certificates.description: Completed AD183 course with 100% score, covering enterprise application development using Java EE. Learned multi-tiered applications, EJBs, JPA persistence, REST APIs, CDI, JMS, and JAAS security. Gained hands-on experience deploying to Red Hat JBoss EAP servers.

certificates.title: Node.js
certificates.description: Completed a 6-week online training covering Node.js fundamentals, asynchronous programming, Node modules, Express web applications, and a final project connecting a web app to MongoDB using AJAX and Node modules. Recognized as a top performer.

experienceSub: My professional journey and hands-on learning experiences

experiences.title: Web Development Intern
experiences.description: I worked as a Web Development Intern, gaining practical experience in building responsive and user-friendly websites. Focused on applying frontend and backend concepts to real-world projects.
responsibilities: Designed and developed responsive webpages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Integrated frontend components with backend APIs
Collaborated with mentors to improve website functionality

achievements: Successfully built and deployed a project website
Received appreciation from mentors for quality work

projectsSub: Here's what I've been working on - showcasing my development journey and skills

projects.title: MediMapper
projects.description: A web-based healthcare platform that helps patients identify diseases based on symptoms, provides home remedies, and enables real-time doctor-patient communication via chat and video calls.
projects.longDescription: MediMapper is a healthcare platform designed to make remote healthcare more accessible and efficient. Patients can input symptoms to identify possible diseases and receive home remedies. The platform also enables secure real-time communication between doctors and patients through chat and video calls using WebRTC. User profiles for patients and doctors, real-time messaging with chat history, and symptom-to-disease mapping are included as core features.
features: Doctor-patient communication via chat and video calls
Real-time messaging with stored chat history
Secure login for patients and doctors

projects.title: Speech Transcriber
projects.description: A web-based speech-to-text application that allows users to transcribe audio files or live speech into text, with history management and secure authentication.
projects.longDescription: Speech Transcriber is a full-stack application built with React, Vite, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It enables users to record or upload audio and convert it into text using the AssemblyAI API. The platform includes secure authentication with JWT, transcription history storage, and a user-friendly interface. Users can view, manage, and delete their transcription history while enjoying a responsive and modern UI built with Tailwind CSS.
features: Upload audio files or record live speech
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS

projects.title: HotWheels Store
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application for HotWheels cars with a React + Vite frontend and Node.js + Express backend using Supabase as the database.
projects.longDescription: HotWheels Store is a modern full-stack e-commerce platform where users can browse, search, and purchase collectible HotWheels cars. The application features a dynamic product catalog, search and filter options, a real-time shopping cart, and a multi-step checkout process with form validation. The frontend is built with React and Vite for high performance, while the backend uses Node.js, Express, and Supabase PostgreSQL for database management. The site is fully responsive, fast, and designed with a clean, modern UI using Lucide icons.
features: Search and filter cars by name, series, or color
Real-time shopping cart with add/remove functionality
Multi-step checkout process with form validation

projectsNote: More projects coming soon! I'm constantly learning and building new things.
